query:
SELECT tc.*, t.name as task_name, p.name as project_name, ct.name as template_name
FROM task_checklists tc
LEFT JOIN tasks t ON tc.task_id = t.id
LEFT JOIN projects p ON t.project_id = p.id
LEFT JOIN checklist_templates ct ON tc.template_id = ct.id
WHERE tc.id = 60002
